team.floracore.common.sender

接口 Sender

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractSender

    public interface Sender
    Wrapper interface to represent a CommandSender/CommandSource within the common command implementations.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String CONSOLE_NAME
      The name used by the console sender.
      static java.util.UUID CONSOLE_UUID
      The uuid used by the console sender.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getDisplayName() 
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the sender's username
      FloraCorePlugin getPlugin()
      Gets the plugin instance the sender is from.
      java.util.UUID getUniqueId()
      Gets the sender's unique id.
      boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
      Check if the Sender has a permission.
      boolean isConsole()
      Gets whether this sender is the console
      default boolean isValid()
      Gets whether this sender is still valid and receiving messages.
      void performCommand(java.lang.String commandLine)
      Makes the sender perform a command.
      void sendMessage(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component message)
      Send a json message to the Sender.

    • 字段详细资料

      • CONSOLE_UUID

        static final java.util.UUID CONSOLE_UUID
        The uuid used by the console sender.

      • CONSOLE_NAME

        static final java.lang.String CONSOLE_NAME
        The name used by the console sender.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPlugin

        FloraCorePlugin getPlugin()
        Gets the plugin instance the sender is from.
        返回:
        the plugin

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the sender's username
        返回:
        a friendly username for the sender

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()

      • getUniqueId

        java.util.UUID getUniqueId()
        Gets the sender's unique id.

        See CONSOLE_UUID for the console's UUID representation.

        返回:
        the sender's uuid

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component message)
        Send a json message to the Sender.
        参数:
        message - the message to send.

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Check if the Sender has a permission.
        参数:
        permission - the permission to check for
        返回:
        true if the sender has the permission

      • performCommand

        void performCommand(java.lang.String commandLine)
        Makes the sender perform a command.
        参数:
        commandLine - the command

      • isConsole

        boolean isConsole()
        Gets whether this sender is the console
        返回:
        if the sender is the console

      • isValid

        default boolean isValid()
        Gets whether this sender is still valid and receiving messages.
        返回:
        if this sender is valid
